The participating terminals were listed in Table 10-6. The Andover earth station, originally built for Telstar, was modified during the period July 1964 through March 1965. The Goonhilly Downs earth station, also an original Telstar terminal, was withdrawn from service in September 1964 for modification to work with Early Bird. Prior to modification, the performance of Goonhilly was about 3 dB down as compared to Andover and Pleumeur Bodou.
